Gabriele-Tergit-Promenade 19
10963 Berlin
company_description: Nordiskt hotellföretag i världsklass som skapar enastående upplevelser för de många människorna. 16 000 medarbetar, 280 hotell i 6 länder.

title: Consulting Associate Director- Cloud Transformation
description:
At **Gartner Consulting** , we don't just advise; we equip leaders with **objective, data-driven insights** from our unparalleled research and advisory business. As an Associate Director, you will lead complex cloud transformations, leveraging our proprietary frameworks and **unique access to enterprise data and analyst expertise** to help clients make the right technology choices and achieve measurable business outcomes. You will leverage your understanding of cloud architectures and emerging technologies to shape transformation journeys, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and industry best practices.


**Key Responsibilities:**

· Strategic Cloud Advisory: Partner with senior stakeholders to define cloud vision, strategy, and transformation roadmaps that support business growth, agility, and resilience.


· Cloud Value Realization: Identify opportunities for cost optimization, scalability, and competitive differentiation through effective cloud utilization and modernization.


· Transformation Leadership: Lead cloud readiness assessments, business case development, and executive workshops to build consensus and drive change across business and IT functions.


· Program Oversight: Manage cloud transformation initiatives, ensuring alignment with governance, security, compliance, and financial management standards.


· Stakeholder Engagement: Communicate complex cloud concepts in clear, business-focused language to facilitate decision-making and cross-functional collaboration.


· Continuous Improvement: Monitor cloud adoption metrics, provide actionable insights, and foster a culture of innovation and continuous learning.


**Required Experience & Skills:**

· Fluent in both Swedish & English


· Demonstrated experience in management consulting, digital transformation, or cloud strategy roles.


· Ability to translate business requirements into actionable cloud strategies and solutions, leveraging knowledge of service and deployment models (IaaS, PaaS, SaaS; public, private, hybrid).


· Familiarity with major cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and their strategic capabilities, as well as the current trends and best practices.


· Understanding of cloud governance, security, compliance, and risk management principles.


· Experience leading cloud projects using Agile methodologies, ensuring timely delivery and adaptability to evolving client needs.


· Exceptional communication skills, with a track record of engaging and influencing senior stakeholders.


**Preferred Qualifications:**

· Experience with cloud reference architectures, cloud landing zones, and modern application delivery models (containerization, serverless, microservices).


· Knowledge of data integration and migration strategies to support seamless transformation.


· Relevant cloud certifications are advantageous but not mandatory.


**Why Join Us?**

· Work with the World's Best Data: Gain unmatched access to Gartner's proprietary research, data, and a network of 2,000+ industry analysts. You'll deliver advice that is objective, actionable, and backed by the most comprehensive IT data in the world and in collaboration with a team of forward-thinking consultants in a dynamic, growth-oriented environment.


· Focus on the Right Advice, Not the Next Project: Unlike traditional consulting, our model prioritizes client success over project duration. Your goal is to provide unbiased, impactful advice, not to prolong engagements.


· Unrivalled Professional Development: Our internal knowledge sharing, direct access to analysts, and dedicated training programs ensure you're always at the forefront of cloud trends.


#LI-WB1


**Who are we?**

At Gartner, Inc. (NYSE:IT), we guide the leaders who shape the world.


Our mission relies on expert analysis and bold ideas to deliver actionable, objective insight, helping enterprise leaders and their teams succeed with their mission-critical priorities.


Since our founding in 1979, we’ve grown to more than 21,000 associates globally who support ~14,000 client enterprises in ~90 countries and territories. We do important, interesting and substantive work that matters. That’s why we hire associates with the intellectual curiosity, energy and drive to want to make a difference. The bar is unapologetically high. So is the impact you can have here.


**What makes Gartner a great place to work?**

Our sustained success creates limitless opportunities for you to grow professionally and flourish personally. We have a vast, virtually untapped market potential ahead of us, providing you with an exciting trajectory long into the future. How far you go is driven by your passion and performance.


We hire remarkable people who collaborate and win as a team. Together, our singular, unifying goal is to deliver results for our clients.


Our teams are inclusive and composed of individuals from different geographies, cultures, religions, ethnicities, races, genders, sexual orientations, abilities and generations.


We invest in great leaders who bring out the best in you and the company, enabling us to multiply our impact and results. This is why, year after year, we are recognized worldwide as a great place to work .


**What do we offer?**

Gartner offers world-class benefits, highly competitive compensation and disproportionate rewards for top performers.


In our hybrid work environment, we provide the flexibility and support for you to thrive — working virtually when it's productive to do so and getting together with colleagues in a vibrant community that is purposeful, engaging and inspiring.


Ready to grow your career with Gartner? Join us.  



  

The policy of Gartner is to provide equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees without regard to race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, citizenship status, age, national origin, ancestry, disability, veteran status, or any other legally protected status and to seek to advance the principles of equal employment opportunity.


Gartner is committed to being an Equal Opportunity Employer and offers opportunities to all job seekers, including job seekers with disabilities. If you are a qualified individual with a disability or a disabled veteran, you may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Company’s career webpage as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by calling Human Resources at +1 (203) 964-0096 or by sending an email to ApplicantAccommodations@gartner.com .


Job Requisition ID:100847
By submitting your information and application, you confirm that you have read and agree to the country or regional recruitment notice linked below applicable to your place of residence.


Gartner Applicant Privacy Link: https://jobs.gartner.com/applicant-privacy-policy  



  

**For efficient navigation through the application, please only use the back button within the application, not the back arrow within your browser.**

title: SAP SD Specialist to Samsung
description:
We are now helping Samsung Nordics find a SAP specialist for an exciting full-time position based in their Stockholm office (Kista).
  
Help Us Create What Can’t Be Done
  
Everything we do at Samsung is driven by an unyielding passion for excellence and an unfaltering commitment to developing the best products and services on the market. In today’s fast-paced global economy, change is constant and innovation is critical to a company’s survival. As we have done for 80 years, we set our sights on the future, anticipating market needs and demands so we can steer our company toward long-term success. As an SAP SD/LE Specialist, you will have an integral part in ensuring we stay on top of the market and continue to enrich and simplify the consumers’ lives.
  
Why join our team?
  
If you are interested in SAP SD/LE/EDI and want to join a team that supports it, there are several compelling reasons why you should consider joining this team.
  
  

**Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technology:**  

We offer an exciting opportunity to work with cutting-edge SAP technology in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. As part of our team, you'll be at the forefront of digital transformation, leveraging SAP SD/LE solutions integrated with EDI to optimize supply chain, Online Store, and logistics operations.
  
We continuously invest in the latest advancements in AI, automation, and cloud-based solutions, giving you the chance to expand your expertise and stay ahead in the industry. If you're passionate about technology and eager to work on innovative projects that drive real business impact, this is the perfect place for you!
  
  

**Collaborative and supportive team culture:**  

This team is dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions and services to internal or external customers. The team members work closely together, sharing knowledge and expertise to ensure that each. The project is a success. By joining this team, you will be part of a collaborative and supportive culture that values teamwork and professional development.
  
  

**Opportunity for growth and advancement:**  

As a member of this team, you will have the opportunity to grow and advance your career.
  
The team offers training and development programs to help you enhance your skills and expand your knowledge. Additionally, as the team continues to grow, there may be opportunities for leadership and management roles.
  
What will this role achieve?
  
As an SAP SD/LE/EDI specialist, you will play a critical role in enhancing our order-to-cash, E-commerce, and logistics processes.
  
Job scope & key deliverables Enhancing EDI Integration – Improve data accuracy and automation through seamless Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) with vendors and third-party logistics providers.
  
Supporting Digital Transformation – Contribute to SAP process automation and new system integrations to enhance business performance.
  
Supporting E-Commerce Systems – Integrate and optimize SAP SD/LE with our e-commerce platforms to ensure smooth order fulfillment, inventory synchronization, and real-time transaction processing.(Cowork with Finance and E-commerce team)
  
Enabling Business Growth – Optimize SAP solutions to improve scalability, flexibility, and operational effectiveness, directly impacting revenue and customer satisfaction.
  
Improving User Experience – Work closely with business teams to design user-friendly SAP functionalities, ensuring smooth adoption and efficiency across departments.
  
What do we need for this role? Experience with SAP SD/LE/EDI – Strong functional knowledge of Sales and Distribution (SD) and Logistics Execution (LE) modules, including configuration and troubleshooting.
  
EDI knowledge – Hands-on experience with Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) integration, mapping, and troubleshooting transactions with customers and suppliers.
  
E-Commerce support Experience – Understanding of SAP’s role in B2B/B2C e-commerce platforms, order fulfillment, and inventory synchronization.
  
SAP S/4HANA Knowledge (Preferred) – Experience in SAP S/4HANA migration or implementation is a plus.
  
Process Improvement Mindset – Ability to analyze business needs, identify process gaps, and implement SAP solutions that enhance efficiency.
  
Technical Skills – Familiarity with IDOCs, ABAP debugging, and middleware integrations is beneficial.
  
Collaboration & Communication – Ability to work closely with cross-functional teams, business users, and external partners to drive successful SAP implementations and improvements.
  
Problem-Solving Ability – A proactive approach to troubleshooting and resolving issues in a fast-paced environment.
  
  

Samsung is a dynamic company in a fast-moving industry with many opportunities to grow and develop! To enjoy working with us, you must appreciate tempo, change, and taking initiative.
  
  

About the assignment
  
For this assignment you will be hired as a full-time consultant by Digitalenta. We offer our consultants a generous package including healthcare allowance, insurance policy, paid vacation days and pension savings. In addition, you'll also have a dedicated consultant manager available throughout your employment with us, in addition to optional networking activities with our network of consultants.

title: Senior Projektledare
description:
Techster Solutions befinner i dagsläget sig i en spännande tillväxtfas och söker nu fler kollegor, inledningsvis dig med minst 7+ års erfarenhet och som kan stärka teamet.
  
Du kan förvänta dig en omväxlande miljö, dagarna kan se väldigt olika ut - men en sak är säkert, här får du använda dina kompetenser och sätter själv gränsen för hur mycket du vill utvecklas. Som ett kunskapsbolag är det viktigt för oss att våra specialister delar med sig av sin kompetens och får kollegorna att växa.
  
Uppdragsbeskrivning
  
Organisationen ska genomföra en uppgradering av sitt affärssystem från IFS Applications 10 till IFS Cloud. Projektet är verksamhetsorienterat med ett tydligt fokus på processdriven förändringsledning, där standardiserade arbetssätt är ett av projektets viktigaste mål.
  
Rollbeskrivning
  
Projektledaren kommer att ha det övergripande ansvaret för att planera, leda och följa upp projektets genomförande. Rollen kräver en erfaren, stark och trygg ledare som kan navigera i komplexa organisationer och driva förändring i nära samarbete med både verksamhet och externa parter.
  
Lokal förankring i Västerås är ett krav – kandidaten ska vara verksam och närvarande på
  
plats i huvudsak.
  
  

Ansvarsområden
  
* Övergripande projektledning och koordinering av uppgraderingsprojektet
* Etablera och följa upp projektplan, riskhantering och kommunikationsplan
* Styrgruppsarbete samt uppföljning mot mål, budget, tidplan och kvalitet
* Säkerställa harmonisering mellan affärssystem och verksamhetsprocesser
* Leda och samordna interna och externa resurser
* Rapportera till styrgrupp och föra dialog med ledning och chefer
* Driva förändringsledning och utbildningsinsatser tillsammans med utsedd


förändringsledare, verksamhet och delprojektledare
  
  

Kravprofil
  
  

**Måste-krav:**  

* Minst 7-10 års erfarenhet som projektledare
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda liknande uppgraderingsprojekt inom affärssystem
* Erfarenhet av verksamhetsnära projekt med processinriktat arbetssätt
* God kommunikatör med vana att föra dialog med ledningsgrupper och chefer, både på


svenska och engelska
  
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med externa leverantörer
* God förståelse för förändringsledning och användarcentrerad implementering


**Meriterande:**  

* Certifiering inom projektledning (t.ex. PMP, IPMA, PRINCE2, PPS)
* Erfarenhet från energibranschen eller liknande bransch
* God förståelse för affärsprocesser inom exempelvis underhåll, ekonomi, inköp och


logistik
  
* Kunskap om IFS Cloud


Ansökan Tror du att du är Techster Solutions nästa stjärna? Tveka då inte att skicka in din ansökan redan nu. Urval sker löpande och tillträde sker enligt överenskommelse.
  
Arbetsplats och kulturVi är ett entreprenördrivet IT företag, med både produktkunskap och försäljning (Techster AB) och konsultativa tjänster (Techster Solutions AB). Det innebär att vi är mycket öppna för nya tekniska lösningar, kunskapsutbyte och ständigt lärande. Att ha roligt och samtidigt behålla den familjära andan utan hierarkier är lika viktigt.
  
Vi vill skapa det konsultbolag som du alltid velat jobba för, men kanske inte hittat ännu. Redan idag har vi en blandning av seniora och yngre medarbetare, såväl som män och kvinnor. Det vill vi fortsätta att bygga på. Så välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Cyber Threat Hunter
description:
Do you have a passion for Cyber Security and Threat Hunting ?
In Swedbank you have the opportunity to:Work in Swedbank’s Cyber Defense Center to help protect the bank against cyber attacks.
Proactively hunt for advanced threats, stealthy intrusions, and anomalous behaviors in our environment.
Research new attack techniques to uncover innovative detection capabilities
Develop and execute hunt hypotheses based on CTI insights, Purple Team findings, and environmental baselines.
What is needed in this role:
As a Cyber Threat Hunter you are searching for cyber threats that are lurking undetected in a network. You dig deep to find malicious actors that has slipped past the initial defenses.
You are passionate about what you do and are a strong team player.  

Here are the required qualifications:  


3+ years in a technical role in the areas of Security Operations, Threat Intelligence, Cyber Incident Response or Penetration Testing/Red Team.
Hands-on experience with SIEM and EDR/XDR tools (preferably Microsoft Sentinel and Defender).
Ability to create and refine hunt queries (KQL or equivalent).
Good understanding of enterprise networking environments.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or related field – or equivalent professional experience.

Preferred qualifications:
Strong understanding of attacker TTPs and mapping to MITRE ATT&CK.
Familiarity with NDR tools like Vectra or similar.
Experience analyzing diverse data sources including Windows event logs, network traffic, and cloud service logs.
Ability to work from both structured threat intel and self-developed hypotheses.
Clear communicator, able to document and share findings with technical and non-technical audiences.

Bonus points for:
Previous Purple Team or Red/Blue Team collaboration experience.
Scripting skills (Python, PowerShell) for advanced hunting and data analysis.
Experience with behavioral analytics or anomaly detection techniques.
With us, you can experience:Personal and professional growth through self-leadership and continuous development.
Meaningful work that positively impacts our workplace, our customers, and society.
An open and collaborative culture that encourages cross-functional teamwork and provides networking opportunities.
A supportive and inclusive environment that promotes a balanced and sustainable work-life, with flexible working conditions when suitable for the role.
Benefits such as our share based reward program Eken, company pension plan, employee offer for banking products, health insurance.

"Join our team and...
work as a Cyber threat hunter. You will search for cyber threats that are lurking undetected in a network or dig deep to find malicious actors that has slipped past the initial defenses. " Robert Jonsson, your future manager  

We look forward to receiving your application by 18.09.2025.
Location: **Stockholm, Sundbyberg**  

Recruiting manager: Robert Jonsson
We may begin the selection during the application period, so we welcome your application as soon as possible.*We have made our choice regarding recruitment media and therefore kindly decline contact with ad sellers or sellers of other recruitment services.*  

  

**Swedbank does not discriminate anybody based on gender, age, sexual orientation or sexual identity, ethnicity, religion or disability – everybody is welcome.**
  
**Job area**
IT and data
**Role**
Cyber Security
**Locations**
Stockholm Region

title: Databricks Engineer
description:
### **Assignment Description**


* Design, develop, and maintain data platforms and governance frameworks within the Firecrackers team, with a strong focus on Databricks.
* Drive improvements of the Databricks platform setup and ensure scalable, robust, and secure data pipelines.
* Design and implement governance models, catalogues, and metadata management to ensure compliance and high data quality.
* Implement and manage Infrastructure as Code (IaC) solutions for Databricks and related cloud services, enabling automated, reliable, and reproducible environments.
* Collaborate with stakeholders (developers, data scientists, business) to understand requirements and translate them into governed, production-ready data products.

  


**Requirements**


* BSc/MSc in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or equivalent work experience in relevant industry.
* Python, SQL, Terraform (or equivalent IaC tools).
* Deep expertise in Databricks platform, including Delta Lake, Unity Catalog, and Databricks internals.
* Experience in Infrastructure as Code (Terraform preferred), automation, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Knowledge in cloud technologies (preferably AWS).
* Strong background in modelling structured and unstructured data.

title: Data Scientists
description:
**Unlock your potential at Accenture**


Are you ready to turn raw data into actionable insights and shape the future of decision-making? At **Accenture**, we’re searching for a **Data Scientist**

**Consultant** to join our dynamic team. If you have 3-5 years of experience and a passion for problem-solving, innovation and collaboration, we’re excited to meet you.

**What we do at Accenture**


Accenture is a global leader in consulting and technology services. We help businesses harness the power of data to drive innovation and deliver value. By combining industry expertise with cutting-edge technology, we empower our clients to make data-driven decisions and achieve their goals. With over 700,000 colleagues worldwide, our network thrives on creativity, inclusivity, and collaboration—and we’re just getting started.

**What you’ll do:**

* **Discover insights:** Analyze complex datasets to uncover trends, patterns, and opportunities that drive business transformation.
* **Build smarter models:** Develop machine learning models and algorithms to solve challenging business problems.
* **Collaborate to innovate:** Work with diverse teams to design and implement scalable data solutions.
* **Experiment and evolve:** Stay ahead of the curve by exploring the latest tools and techniques in AI and data science.
* **Drive real impact:** Partner with our clients to create solutions that are practical, innovative, and aligned with their strategic goals.

  

**What we’re looking for:**

* **Experience:** 3-5 years in data science, machine learning, or related fields. Familiarity with tools like Python, R, and SQL is essential.
* **Skills:** Proficiency in statistical modeling, predictive analytics, and visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Also exceptional written and spoken skills in Dutch & English. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus.
* **Mindset:** A curious problem-solver with a passion for turning data into stories...

**What we offer:**

* **Impactful work:** Collaborate with Fortune 500 companies and solve real-world problems.
* **Career growth:** Access world-class training, certificates, mentorship, career coaching and opportunities to grow your expertise.
* **Flexibility:** Enjoy a hybrid work model that supports your work-life balance.
* **Recognition:** Be part of a team that values your contributions and celebrates your successes.
* **Inclusive culture:** Thrive in an environment where every voice is valued, and innovation is a team sport.


These promises are reflected through our excellent employee benefits, including:

* Flexible working hours (4x9) & work location, FlexMoment leave of absence program (50% paid leave of absence for 3 months) and FlexDay; a flexible day you can take off to celebrate what matters to you – from Eid al-Fitr to a birthday.
* Paid leave: Parental leave, Partner leave for all non-birthing parents, Bereavement leave, and Gender affirmation leave.
* Flexible mobility benefits: electric bicycle, car lease, or a mobility budget for public transport;
* Pension scheme, Accenture shares, annual bonus, collective health insurance scheme
* Social activities like Friday Drinks, sport events and parties

**Location: Malmö**

**Why Accenture?**


At Accenture, we blend technology and human ingenuity to create smarter solutions for our clients and the world. We’re not just a workplace—we’re a community where ideas flourish, careers grow, and meaningful impact happens every day.

**Let’s build the future together.**


Ready to turn data into powerful insights and drive real-world impact? Join Accenture’s expert data science team to work on cutting-edge AI, ML, and analytics solutions. Apply now and shape the future with data!
company_description: Our 721,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success.

title: Data Engineers (Databricks, Microsoft Fabric)
description:
**Unlock the power of data with Accenture**


At **Accenture**, we don’t just embrace change – we lead it. We blend innovation, technology, and human ingenuity to drive transformative solutions for some of the world’s most renowned organizations. As a trusted partner to Fortune 500 companies, we create cutting-edge strategies that not only push industries forward but also help organizations navigate complex challenges, driving progress that benefits both businesses and communities.


If you’re a dynamic Data Engineer with a knack for Azure, Microsoft Fabric, and Databricks, this is your chance to join a team where your skills and passions can create real-world change. Join us in pushing the boundaries of data engineering!

**What you’ll do:**

* Partner with Fortune 500 clients to design and implement cutting-edge data solutions using Azure, Microsoft Fabric, and Databricks.
* Design and maintain data pipelines for efficient processing in a variety of data environments.
* Stay ahead of the curve by exploring and integrating the latest data engineering tools and technologies.
* Lead projects from start to finish: from data ingestion and transformation to modeling and performance optimization.

  

**Who we’re looking for:**

* **Experience:** 3-5 years in data engineering, with strong expertise in Azure, Databricks and/or Microsoft Fabric.
* **Skills:** Proficiency in Python/Scala, SQL, and modern data architectures (e.g. lake houses, streaming pipelines). Also exceptional written and spoken skills in Dutch & English.
* **Mindset:** A problem-solver who thrives in fast-paced environments, with a passion for making a difference.
* **Values:** A dedication to delivering excellence, embracing innovation, and fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment.

**What we offer:**

* **A** **purpose-driven career**: Work on impactful projects that matter.
* **Continuous learning:** Access to certifications, courses, and innovation hubs, career coaching, mentorship, and internal growth opportunities to help (young) professionals thrive at Accenture.
* **Global opportunities:** Collaborate with a worldwide network of experts.
* **Flexibility & balance:** Hybrid work options and wellness initiatives.
* **Inclusive culture:** Be part of a vibrant team where diversity and authenticity are celebrated.

  

These promises are reflected through our excellent employee benefits, including:

* Flexible working hours (4x9) & work location, FlexMoment leave of absence program (50% paid leave of absence for 3 months) and FlexDay; a flexible day you can take off to celebrate what matters to you – from Eid al-Fitr to a birthday.
* Paid leave: Parental leave, Partner leave for all non-birthing parents, Bereavement leave, and Gender affirmation leave.
* Flexible mobility benefits: electric bicycle, car lease, or a mobility budget for public transport
* Pension scheme, Accenture shares, annual bonus, collective health insurance scheme
* Social activities like Friday Drinks, sport events and parties

**Location: Malmö**

 **Your future starts here!**  

Ready to build scalable data solutions on Azure and work with cutting-edge cloud technology? Join Accenture’s expert team and drive real innovation. Apply today and take your career to the next level!

title: Creative Video Producer
description:
Marketing · Stockholm · Hybridarbete
**Creative Video Producer**
===========================


**Ett jobb för dig som älskar film och storytelling – från idé och inspelning till färdig kampanj. Du får skapa innehåll som bygger varumärke och når publik både lokalt och internationellt.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  



**Om JumpYard:**  

Vår första park i Sverige, JumpYard Barkarby, invigdes 2017 och redan från start kunde vi erbjuda fler aktiviteter än bara trampoliner.


Efter JumpYard Barkarby har vi öppnat fler parker i Sverige, Danmark, Norge, Spanien, Portugal och snart Tyskland! Idag har vi totalt 25 parker. Utvecklingen av våra parker går fort framåt och idag kan våra gäster uppleva aktiviteter som Clip ‘N Climb, Sky Rider, Valo Jump och olika Ninjabanor.


Framgången består förstås i människors förtjusta inställning till rörelseglädje! En annan viktig framgångsfaktor är vår personal – med fokus på gästupplevelse, flexibilitet och inspiration ger de gästerna valuta för inträdet sju dagar i veckan året runt. Nu söker vi en Creative Video Producer till vårt globala marknadsteam. Vill du bli en del av JumpYard och ha #seriouslyfun tillsammans med oss?


**Vi letar efter en erfaren kreatör som kan ta våra filmer och kampanjer till nästa nivå – någon som kan leda hela processen från idé och koncept till färdig leverans, och som vet hur man får både en storslagen reklamfilm och en snabb sociala medier-produktion att kännas lika skarp.**


Du kommer att arbeta nära vårt marknadsteam och ha stort kreativt mandat. Ena dagen är du ute på inspelning i en av våra parker eller på en global location, nästa dag klipper du ihop en kampanj. Du är trygg i både kreativa och tekniska delar av produktionen, och du har en stark känsla för hur innehåll bygger varumärke och driver försäljning.

### **Om rollen**


Som Creative Video Producer blir du en nyckelspelare i vårt marknadsteam och den kreativa kraften bakom vår visuella storytelling. Du ansvarar för hela processen – från idé och manus till färdig produktion.  

Du rör dig tryggt mellan planerade reklamfilmsproduktioner och snabba kampanjfilmer för sociala medier, och du använder både traditionella produktionsmetoder och AI-verktyg för att lyfta idéarbetet, effektivisera produktionen och utforska nya kreativa möjligheter.


Vi är ett globalt företag och flera av våra produktioner kommer ske internationellt. Du kommer därför ibland att arbeta med projekt som både planeras, filmas och distribueras globalt, i nära samarbete med kollegor och partners i andra länder.

### **Du kommer att…**


* Planera, filma och fotografera nyhetskampanjer, varumärkeskampanjer och konverteringsdrivet innehåll.
* Använda AI-verktyg som stöd i idéarbete, formatutveckling och produktion.
* Utveckla och testa nya contentformat och plattformar, inklusive AI-driven contentgenerering.
* Skapa koncept, manus och storyboard för reklamfilm och digitala kampanjer.
* Filma, klippa, hantera ljudupptagning och efterproduktion för både bild och rörligt material.
* Säkerställa att allt innehåll håller högsta möjliga nivå och följer vår visuella identitet och tonalitet.
* Ta ansvar för tidsplan och leverans i alla led.
* Anpassa material för olika kanaler och målgrupper, från TV och YouTube till TikTok och Instagram.
* Delta i utvecklingen av vår varumärkesstrategi och säkerställa att all produktion stärker vårt varumärke långsiktigt.


### **Vi tror att du…**


* Har minst 3 års erfarenhet av professionell videoproduktion, gärna från reklamfilm eller varumärkesbyggande kampanjer.
* Har utmärkta kunskaper inom fotografering, filmning, produktion och efterbearbetning.
* Är kreativ, nytänkande och van att driva projekt från start till mål med hög kvalitet.
* Är trygg med både det kreativa och det tekniska i produktionen.
* Har erfarenhet av att tolka och utveckla en varumärkesplattform och tonalitet.
* Trivs med att arbeta i internationella team och att producera material för en global publik.

  



**Verktyg & tekniker vi tror att du behärskar**


* Adobe Creative Cloud (Premiere Pro, After Effects, Photoshop, Lightroom).
* Final Cut Pro eller motsvarande videoredigeringsprogram.
* AI-verktyg för idé- och contentproduktion (t.ex. ChatGPT, Midjourney, Runway).
* Kamerateknik för både stillbild och rörligt.
* Ljudupptagning och efterbearbetning.


### **Meriterande om du…**


* Är idérik när det gäller kreativa reklamkoncept och har en känsla för att skriva slagkraftig copy till reklamfilmer och kampanjvideos.
* Behärskar motion graphics eller animation.
* Utforskat eller använt AI-drivna verktyg för video, ljud eller bild.


### **Ansökan**


Skicka in ditt CV och **portfolio/showreel** som visar din bredd och spets inom film, foto och efterbearbetning.

  

Välkommen med din ansökan – rekrytering sker löpande och tjänsten önskar vi tillsätta omgående.

  

Avdelning
Marketing
Platser
Stockholm
Distansarbete
Hybridarbete
Kontakt Eva Lopez Jarl Nordic Marketing Manager – Marketing
**Kollegor**
------------

Eva Lopez Jarl
Nordic Marketing Manager
  
**Stockholm**
-------------


  
**Arbetsplats och kultur**
--------------------------


Vi är en plats där man kan umgås, träffa nya vänner, prova nya saker, misslyckas och försöka igen. En energisk atmosfär med härlig stämning där vi har seriously fun tillsammans!

  

Vi är en timme av rörelse innan läxorna. En helg med familjetid. Ett sommarläger där du kan utmanas och växa. Vi är en actionfylld park för alla som vill få en boost av puls och nöje.

  

Men vi är inte bara en park. Vi är en sammansvetsad familj av Yarders som alltid är glada över att se varandra och våra gäster. Hoppas du vill bli en del av vår familj!


  
**Om JumpYard**
---------------

JumpYard driver aktivitetscenter för främst barn och ungdomar, där kombinationen lek, rörelse och glädje är i fokus.  

Våra parker erbjuder fler aktiviteter än bara trampolinhoppning, då vi anser att alla ska kunna, och vilja hitta sin egen utmaning.  

Vi har parker i Sverige, Danmark, Norge, Portugal och Spanien.



Grundades 2017
Medarbetare 800
Omsättning 260M SEK

title: Public Cloud Engagement Architect
description:
As a Public Cloud Engagement Architect, you’ll be at the heart of our customers’ cloud journeys, helping them unlock the true value of Public Cloud. This is a hybrid role where you’ll combine technical insight, delivery leadership, and customer engagement to accelerate cloud adoption. Your focus will be split between identifying opportunities to drive business value for existing customers; through cloud assessments, advisory, and pre-sales, and providing hands-on consultancy services for customers navigating cloud transformation.


You’ll join our growing Public Cloud Delivery team, a group of skilled cloud consultants working side-by-side with customers on exciting and complex projects. With big ambitions ahead, this role is a chance to shape how we deliver value at scale, acting as a cloud enabler who connects strategy with execution, and ensuring smooth handovers to our consultant team for implementation. If you’re ready to blend advisory with consultancy and help customers transform their business through Azure, this is the opportunity to make a real impact.

 **What you will do:**


* Lead and facilitate Public Cloud engagements – from early-stage strategy discussions to active project delivery, continuously driving close customer collaboration.
* Design scalable Public Cloud delivery models, including reusable playbooks, allowing internal teams to engage with multiple customers in parallel.
* Identify existing Orange Business on-prem customers and drive their journey to Public Cloud.
* Support with recruitment and development of our Public Cloud Delivery team – including mentorship, upskilling, and process development.
* Collaborate with our Public Cloud Business Area Manager, Public Cloud Consultants, and our Sales department to shape end-to-end cloud offerings.
* Facilitate workshops and strategic sessions with both customers and internal stakeholders.
* Define and implement structured approaches to cloud engagement that are more efficient than traditional on-prem delivery models.
* Meet with customers on-site and collaborate with the team at our Stockholm office, with flexibility for travel as needed.

  

**Who You Are:**


* You thrive in front of customers, with strong communication and relationship-building skills that make you a trusted advisor.
* You’re hands-on when needed, yet able to take a strategic view - spotting opportunities where others see complexity.
* You’re proactive and innovative, taking initiative rather than waiting for direction.
* You’re passionate about improving how teams deliver value through Public Cloud, and you actively drive collaboration across functions.
* You’re comfortable coordinating across multiple internal teams and customers, acting as the connector who makes things happen.

  

**We would like you to have:**




* 5+ years in a senior advisory Public Cloud role (e.g. Solutions Architect, Public Cloud Tech Lead, or similar).
* Solid technical background in Azure. Experience with other hyperscalers (e.g. AWS) is a plus.
* Consulting background with proven pre**-**sales experience, including customer meetings and scoping challenges.
* Strong business awareness with a track record of leading customer innovation projects.
* Demonstrated ability to leverage Public Cloud delivery and operational models to accelerate customer value and innovation.
* Fluent in both Swedish and English.
  

**What we offer you:**

* Hybrid ways of working with access to our modern & collaborative office in Stockholm
* We may work with tomorrow’s technology, but at our core we are a people-oriented organization and we are proud to have our Great Place to Work certification
* An open and inclusive culture, that enables us to reach our full potential
* A community of experts - as Digital Natives, we put innovation at the heart of our expertise
* Read more about the benefits we offer here.

 **About Orange Business:**


Orange Business is a leading network and digital integrator company with offices in 65 countries worldwide, and part of the Orange Group.


Digital Services, a business line of Orange Business is a newly created division within Orange Business. In Europe the business line consists of approximately 1500 people distributed across 10 countries. We are digital natives, with innovation at the core of our business, which makes us a reliable partner close to our customers. Our joint mission is to help innovate, drive and lead them in their digital transformation challenges and business strategies in key digital domains, including Cloud, Customer Experience, Digital Workspace and Data & AI. As an agile and fast-moving digital business partner, the business line offers trusted end-to-end solutions and products that help businesses in a wide range of industries in the private and public sector transform their operations, enhance customer experience, and drive growth.


With our digital expertise, we are a strategic partner of Orange Business objectives to be a leading network and digital integrator with our team as a key growth engine.

 **The process:**

  

We screen applications on an ongoing basis, with the aim of conducting conversations and interviews as we receive them.


Interested but feel that you don´t match the criteria 100%? We encourage you to apply anyway! We believe in the potential of diverse skill sets, perspectives and individuality. We want to encourage everyone to be their authentic selves and your unique capabilities may align perfectly with our team's needs! Your perfect match might be the next job we are announcing, so why not have a head start and apply now!


Are you interested to read more about Orange Business? Visit our Website or follow our LinkedIn account.

title: Staff Engineer – AI Team
description:
Odevo is a group of exciting brands with a shared vision of challenging status quo in the property management industry. We are committed to revolutionizing the industry with innovative software solutions that make managing properties easier, more efficient, and more effective. Our rapidly growing product and engineering organization now includes around 200 highly skilled professionals.


Our cloud-based platform is unique, and in a brief time, we have proven ourselves as a leading and innovative player on the market. Our product development department acts as a SaaS supplier to all the companies in the Odevo group and several other players in the industry. Together, we will continue to challenge and change this industry. To continue our ambitious growth journey, we seek more great people to join us to build market-leading property management software products. Are you one of them?


As a Staff Engineer in the AI Team, you will be part of a team that is responsible for our organization's AI-focused initiatives, unlocking the full potential of artificial intelligence to create transformative solutions for our business opportunities. With your experience in building and maintaining a microservice architecture built with Python you will guide the other engineers in the AI team to deliver AI solutions to business problems, mainly through usage of LLMs from various providers. We want to deeply integrate AI across our organization, drive innovation and ensure that AI is a clear part of our business strategy.


You will be reporting to our AI Engineering Manager.


**Who You Are:**  

You are an experienced and driven software engineer who has been part of the Generative AI wave, and both experimented with and shipped applications to real users. Complex challenges do not deter you; they intrigue you. You tackle them methodically, finding practical solutions that truly make a difference. You are an excellent communicator who really enjoys to share knowledge through actions and mentorship of less senior engineers. You prefer working in a team with developers, designers and product managers and deeply collaborate with your team rather than working from specifications. You communicate effectively and can discuss the pros and cons of different options in constructive ways.


As the AI field is moving forward at enormous speed, you are constantly following tech news for interesting developments that you can use to solve business problems.


**Responsibilities**

* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including engineers, and product managers, to define requirements, deliver and maintain AI solutions that meet business needs.
* Mentor and guide other engineers in the AI Team and other teams at Odevo, sharing your expertise in building AI applications and microservice architectures.
* Stay up to date with the latest developments in generative AI, actively following open-source projects and explore innovative AI technologies that can benefit the organization.
* Document architecture designs, algorithms, and best practices for knowledge sharing within the organization.
* Assist and inspire AI development done by other teams in the organization.

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, Machine Learning, or a related field.
* 10+ years of experience in software development using Python. Experience with React for frontend development and other languages is also valued as we’re always open to using the best tool for the task at hand.
* Proven experience with building applications for real users, spanning design, frontend, backend, databases and infrastructure. We don’t require deep experience in all areas.
* Proficiency in Swedish


*You will be asked to demo your experience in the interview process*

**Location**  

We highly value the opportunity to collaborate closely with our Stockholm-based team in person. At the same time, we recognize the importance of having uninterrupted time for deep focus. Therefore, our team follows a hybrid setup, typically spending 3 days at the Stockholm office and 2 days working remotely from home, allowing for a flexible approach that combines the best of both worlds. However, team members are welcome to come into the office more frequently if they prefer!

 **What we offer**

  

* Professional growth - to work with the most talented developers in the industry.
* Modern technology - we invest in the latest technologies and tools and encourage our team members to share their ideas and take ownership of their work.
* Innovation - to work on exciting projects that push the boundaries of our industry and make a real impact.
* Commitment to quality - a dynamic and forward-thinking company that values profitable and long-term product development.

**Excited?**  

If you are excited about being part of a successful team, apply for this position!


Why we formed Odevo  

About Odevo  

Our Software
